value.message: Variable '__report' uses uncommon abbreviation and does not clearly indicate its purpose.

value.message: Resource access in createE2EClient uses predictable string IDs (e.g., 'test-user-1'), which may allow IDOR if backend does not verify ownership.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend authorization checks resource ownership and use UUIDs or encrypted IDs for user/task/swarm identifiers.
